thread.title: Most Loved Quince Finds of 2025 (Timeless Pieces I Wear on Repeat)
thread.title_full: Most Loved Quince Finds of 2025 (Timeless Pieces I Wear on Repeat)

author: Tania Stephens
title: Most Loved Quince Finds of 2025 (Timeless Pieces I Wear on Repeat)
text:
Most Loved Quince Finds of 2025 (Timeless Pieces I Wear on Repeat)
I didn’t plan on falling this hard for Quince. I really didn’t.
It started innocently enough with their famous $50 cashmere sweater. I figured I’d try one, just to see what the fuss was about. Worst case, I’d return it. Best case, I’d have a decent sweater for the price.
Well. Here we are.
Quince has quietly become one of my favorite places to shop because the quality feels much higher than the price tag, the styles are classic and wearable, and their return policy is hands-down one of the easiest I’ve dealt with. That matters, especially when ordering online.
Since my word of the year is simplify, I’ve been paying more attention to the pieces that make getting dressed easier, not harder. Quince has helped simplify my closet because they focus on timeless, classic styles that work year after year, which means fewer decisions and more outfits that just work.
These are the top Quince fashion pieces you’ve loved right along with me. These are the items that sold again and again, across multiple platforms, and earned their place in my closet.
The Quince Pieces I Loved Most (And You Did Too)
Lightweight Cotton Cashmere Link-Stitch Dolman Sweater
This sweater is the one that made me realize Quince was doing something right.
It’s lightweight but cozy, relaxed without looking sloppy, and the dolman shape gives you room without clinging. This is the sweater I reach for on days when I want to feel comfortable but still look somewhat pulled together. Joe has complimented this one more than once, which always makes me laugh since he never knows where my clothes come from.
Why it works
- Soft without being heavy
- Drapes nicely over the body
- Easy to dress up or down
- Perfect for women who want comfort without bulk
Mongolian Cashmere Crewneck Sweater
This is the $50 sweater that made me stop side-eyeing affordable cashmere.
It’s classic, simple, and one of those pieces you’ll wear year after year. The fit is easy, not tight, not boxy, just right. I’ve worn this with jeans, trousers, and even layered under coats when it’s cold.
Why it works
- True classic shape
- Soft without itching
- Works for everyday wear
- Looks far more expensive than it is
Mongolian Cashmere Tee
This one surprises people, but it shouldn’t.
A Cashmere Tee sounds fancy, but this is actually one of the most wearable pieces in my closet. It’s great on its own in mild weather and perfect for layering when it’s cooler. This is an elevated basic that makes even simple outfits feel intentional.
Why it works
- Lightweight and breathable
- Great layering piece
- Polished but casual
- Ideal for transitional weather
Italian Leather Convertible Crescent Handwoven Bag
This Handwoven Handbag is proof that accessories matter.
The shape is beautiful, the leather is soft, and it holds more than you’d expect. I love that it works for everyday errands but still looks nice enough to carry to lunch or dinner. It’s one of those bags that quietly pulls an outfit together.
Why it works
- Soft, quality leather
- Versatile shape
- Easy to wear with casual or dressier outfits
- A great neutral investment piece
Organic Cotton Oversized Cable Cardigan
This Oversized Cable Cardigan leans a little more cozy and a little more substantial.
It has that classic fisherman texture that adds interest without being busy. I love this sweater for colder days when you want warmth but still want to look put together. It’s comfortable, flattering, and easy to style.
Why it works
- Chunky without feeling bulky
- Adds texture to simple outfits
- Warm and soft
- A great cold-weather staple
Italian Suede Shopper Tote
This Suede Shopper Tote is the kind of bag you carry when you need room but don’t want to look like you’re hauling everything you own.
The suede feels rich, the shape is timeless, and it’s incredibly practical. This is a great everyday bag for running around, traveling, or long days out.
Why it works
- Spacious but structured
- Soft suede elevates the look
- Great for everyday use
- Neutral enough to go with everything
Mongolian Cashmere Cardigan Sweater
A good cardigan is worth its weight in gold, and this Cashmere one earns its place.
It’s easy to throw on, soft against the skin, and it works well worn alone, or over tees, tanks, or blouses. This is the piece I grab when the house is chilly or when I need a light layer to head out the door.
Why it works
- Classic, timeless shape
- Easy layering piece
- Soft and comfortable
- Works year-round
Italian Leather Pointed Bow Flats
Comfortable flats are hard to find, and these Leather Pointed Bow Flats deliver.
They’re polished, feminine, and easy to wear all day. I love them with jeans, trousers, and even dresses when I don’t want to wear heels. I also have them in almond that I wear a lot in the warmer months.
Why it works
- Comfortable for all-day wear
- Pointed toe feels polished
- Soft leather
- A great alternative to heels
Washable Stretch Silk Split Neck Blouse
This Split Neck Blouse feels special without being fussy.
The washable silk is a huge plus, and the split neck is flattering without being revealing. This is one of those tops that elevates whatever you pair it with. I’ve worn it with jeans, skirts, and pants, and it looked great with all of them.
Why it works
- Easy-care silk
- Flattering neckline
- Looks polished with minimal effort
- Great for work or dressier occasions
Wool Cashmere Short Coat
This Wool Cashmere Coat is a perfect example of Quince’s quality-to-price sweet spot.
It’s warm, structured, and looks far more expensive than it is. I love the shorter length because it works well with jeans and doesn’t overwhelm the frame.
Why it works
- Warm without bulk
- Clean, classic lines
- Easy to style casually or dressy
- A great everyday coat
Comfort Stretch Short Trench Coat
A trench coat is one of those pieces that never goes out of style, and this Short Trench Coat gets worn a lot.
The stretch makes it comfortable, and the shorter length keeps it practical. This is a great layering piece for transitional weather.
Why it works
- Comfortable stretch fabric
- Classic trench style
- Easy length for everyday wear
- Great for spring and fall
Stretch Crepe Trench Coat
This Crepe Trench Coat is a little more polished and structured.
It’s the one I reach for when I want a cleaner, more tailored look. It works beautifully over dresses, trousers, or jeans.
Why it works
- Sleek, tailored shape
- Drapes well
- Timeless design
- Instantly pulls an outfit together
Why I Keep Coming Back to Quince
Quince has earned my loyalty the old-fashioned way. These are the kinds of pieces that stay in your closet year after year, quietly doing their job and making getting dressed easier, a little like reaching for the same favorite teacup every morning. And if something doesn’t work, their return policy makes it easy to send it back without stress.
I started with one cashmere sweater, and now I have an entire list of favorites I wear on repeat. Judging by how well these pieces sold, I know I’m not alone.
If you’re curious about Quince, these are the pieces I’d start with. They’re classics for a reason.
Questions You Might Be Asking
Why is Quince so popular?
Quince focuses on high-quality materials like cashmere, silk, and Italian leather at affordable prices. Their pieces are timeless, easy to wear, and designed to last, which is why so many women keep coming back.
Is Quince cashmere good quality?
Yes. Quince uses Grade A Mongolian cashmere, and their sweaters are soft, comfortable, and hold up well with proper care. Many of their cashmere pieces cost significantly less than similar styles elsewhere.
What should I buy first from Quince?
If you’re new to Quince, cashmere is a great place to start. Their sweaters, tees, and cardigans are consistently popular and easy to wear. Bags and outerwear are also strong investment pieces.
Is Quince good for women over 50?
Absolutely. Quince focuses on classic, timeless styles that don’t feel trendy or age-specific. Their pieces work well for women who want to look polished, comfortable, and confident at any age.
What is Quince’s return policy like?
Quince offers free returns within 365 days, which makes trying new pieces low-risk and stress-free.
Each time you share my posts on PINTEREST, INSTAGRAM, YOUTUBE, AND FACEBOOK, it not only helps other ladies who might be style-challenged find my blog, but it also strengthens our community. Furthermore, I appreciate every one of you and consider you a friend.
Are You One Of The GURLS?
You’ll receive a daily email reminder from me, keeping you updated when a new blog post is published. Additionally, a special email might occasionally appear in your inbox, so be sure to keep an eye out for it.
To GOD Goes The Glory!
Verse Of The Day
John 1:5 (NIV)
5 The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it.
